TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IconSetCondition

summary.span: 代表图标集条件格式规则。

span.span: Represents an icon set conditional formatting rule.

span.para: 所有条件格式对象包含在集合对象，该元素是子对象的集合。您可以创建使用任何一个格式规则的图标集方法或FormatConditions集合的方法。
每个图标集包含三、 四个或五个图标。您使用属性对象返回对象指定一个内置图标集。每个图标集中的单个图标然后由的成员分配给范围的值的子集对象。此对象还指定阈值的类型。

All conditional formatting objects are contained within a collection object, which is a child of a collection. You can create an icon set formatting rule by using either the method or method of the FormatConditions collection.

Each icon set contains three, four, or five icons. You use the property of the object to return an object to specify one of the built-in icon sets. Each individual icon in the icon set is then assigned to a subset of the values of the range by the members of the obect. The type of threshold is also specified by this object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 当使用对象识别符，此属性返回对象代表 Microsoft Office Excel 应用程序。

span.span: When used without an object qualifier, this property returns an object that represents the Microsoft Office Excel application.

summary.span: 如果使用对象识别符，此属性返回值，该值代表指定对象的创建者Application对象。

span.span: When used with an object qualifier, this property returns an Application object that represents the creator of the specified object.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.
Application (see above)

span.para: 您可以使用此属性与 OLE 自动化对象返回该对象的应用程序。
You can use this property with an OLE Automation object to return the application of that object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppliesTo As Range
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::Range ^ AppliesTo { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::Range ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回指定格式规则所应用于的单元格区域的对象。

span.span: Returns a object specifying the cell range to which the formatting rule is applied.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As XlCreator

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数等效于值，该值指示在其中创建此对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer equivalent to an value that indicates the application in which this object was created.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

remarks.span:
如果对象在 Microsoft Excel 中创建的
，此属性返回的字符串 XCEL，这相当于十六进制数字 5843454c。 Creator属性用于在 Microsoft Excel 中用于的 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Excel 的创建者代码 XCEL。

span.para: If the object was created in Microsoft Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C. The Creator property is designed to be used in Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Excel has the creator code XCEL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Delete() runtime managed

summary.span: 删除指定的条件格式规则对象。

span.span: Deletes the specified conditional formatting rule object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Formula { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个代表公式（该公式确定将对图标集应用的值）的 String。

span.span: Returns or sets a String representing a formula, which determines the values to which the icon set will be applied.

span.para: 此属性可用于限制将显示条件格式的值的范围。典型方案是后的号码包含正值和负值范围。要创建的此号码范围的多个条件格式 — 一个正值和负值的另一个用于。

This property is useful to limit the range of values that will display the conditional format. A typical scenario is when you have a range of numbers containing both positive and negative values. You may want to create more than one conditional format for this range of numbers—one for positive values and another for negative values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IconCriteria As IconCriteria

summary.span: 返回集合，代表一组条件的图标集条件格式规则。

span.span: Returns an collection, which represents the set of criteria for an icon set conditional formatting rule.

span.para: 后所集合，您可以使用属性返回的集合的对象。对象代表一个条件的图标集。
After you have the collection, you can use the property of the collection to return an object. The object represents a single criterion of an icon set.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ IconSet { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定的图标集条件格式中使用的集合。

span.span: Returns or sets an collection, which specifies the icon set used in the conditional format.

span.para: ，您可以分配的图标集使用属性对象。
You can assign the icon set by using the property of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ModifyAppliesToRange([in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range Range) runtime managed

param.name: Range
param.span: 此格式规则将应用于的区域。

span.span: The range to which this formatting rule will be applied.

summary.span: 设置此格式规则所应用于的单元格区域。

span.span: Sets the cell range to which this formatting rule applies.

span.para: 范围必须以 A1 引用样式和完全包含在工作表的父级的集合。它可以包括区域运算符 （冒号）、 交点运算符 （空格） 或 union 运算符 （逗号分隔）。也可以使用美元符号，但会被忽略。
您还可以使用局部定义的名称范围的任何部分中，但该名称必须是在宏的语言。

The range must be in the A1 reference style and be entirely contained within the sheet that is the parent of the collection. It can include the range operator (a colon), the intersection operator (a space), or the union operator (a comma). Dollar signs can also be used but they are ignored.
You can also use a local defined name in any part of the range, but the name must be in the language of the macro.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回指定对象的父对象。只读。

span.span: Returns the parent object for the specified object. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PercentileValues { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 Boolean 值，该值指明是否使用百分点确定图标集条件格式的阈值。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean value indicating if the thresholds for an icon set conditional format are determined by using percentiles.

remarks.span:
如果未将每个阈值设置为百分点值，则
此属性将返回False 。此属性设置为True将每个阈值类型设置为百分点。

span.para: This property will return False if not every threshold is set to percentile. Setting this property to True will set every threshold type to percentile.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Priority { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置条件格式规则的优先级值。当工作表中存在多个条件格式规则时，优先级确定求值的顺序。

span.span: Returns or sets the priority value of the conditional formatting rule. The priority determines the order of evaluation when multiple conditional formatting rules exist in a worksheet.

span.para: 时设置的优先级，值必须是介于 1 和工作表上的条件格式规则的总数之间的正整数。优先级必须在工作表上的所有规则的唯一值，因此更改指定的条件格式规则的优先级可能导致要移动的工作表上的其他规则的优先级值。

When setting the priority, the value must be a positive integer between 1 and the total number of conditional formatting rules on the worksheet. The priority must be a unique value for all rules on the worksheet, so changing the priority for the specified conditional formatting rule may cause the priority value of the other rules on the worksheet to be shifted.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PTCondition As Boolean
public: property bool PTCondition { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 Boolean 值，指明是否将条件格式应用于数据透视表图表。只读。

span.span: Returns a Boolean value indicating if the conditional format is being applied to a PivotTable chart. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReverseOrder { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 Boolean 值，该值指示是否保留图标集的图标次序。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean value indicating if the order of icons is reversed for an icon set.

span.para: 默认情况下，您可以使用的图标集的最相关联正图像较高的值。例如，"三色交通灯"图标集应用于绿色圆上限值阈值和区域中的最低值一个红色圆圈。如果数据较低值是更有意义，如马拉松时间结果，您可能要撤销图标于要关联绿色圆与最小值的范围的顺序。

By default, most of the icon sets you can use associate positive images with higher values. For example, the "3 Traffic Lights" icon set applies a green circle to the upper value threshold and a red circle to the lowest values in the range. If your data is such that lower values are more desirable, such as marathon time results, you may want to reverse the order that icons are applied to the range to associate the green circle to the lowest values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlPivotConditionScope ScopeType { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlPivotConditionScope get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlPivotConditionScope value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置的常量之一，是必需的条件格式应用于数据透视表图表时的枚举。

span.span: Returns or sets one of the constants of the enumeration, which determines the scope of the conditional format when it is applied to a PivotTable chart.

span.para: 默认值是，其设置范围使用属性。
The default value is , which sets the scope using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetFirstPriority() runtime managed

summary.span: 将此条件格式规则的优先级值设置为“1”，以便在工作表上的所有其他规则之前计算此规则。

span.span: Sets the priority value for this conditional formatting rule to "1" so that it will be evaluated before all other rules on the worksheet.

span.para: 当您有多个工作表中的条件格式规则如果规则以前没有设置为"1"的优先级时，此方法将导致加一工作表上的所有其他现有规则的优先级。

When you have multiple conditional formatting rules in a worksheet, if the rule was not previously set to priority "1", this method will cause the priority of all other existing rules on the worksheet to be increased by one.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetLastPriority() runtime managed

summary.span: 为此条件格式规则设置求值顺序，以便在工作表上的所有其他规则之后计算此规则。

span.span: Sets the evaluation order for this conditional formatting rule so it is evaluated after all other rules on the worksheet.

span.para: 优先级的实际值将等于的工作表上的条件格式规则的总数。如果您在工作表中有多个条件格式规则，此方法将导致的优先级值大于加一该规则的规则的优先级。

The actual value of the priority will be equal to the total number of conditional formatting rules on the worksheet. When you have multiple conditional formatting rules in a worksheet, this method will cause the priority of rules that had a priority value greater than this rule to be increased by one.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowIconOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 Boolean 值，该值指示是否仅显示图标集条件格式的图标。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean value indicating if only the icon is displayed for an icon set conditional format.

span.para: 此属性的默认值为False。
The default value for this property is False.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StopIfTrue As Boolean
public: property bool StopIfTrue { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 Boolean 值，该值确定在当前规则的计算结果为 True 时是否应计算单元格上的其他格式规则。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean value that determines if additional formatting rules on the cell should be evaluated if the current rule evaluates to True.

span.para: 为了支持向后兼容性，此属性的默认值为True，即的格式的行为相反用户界面中创建的规则。
To support backward compatibility, the default value for this property is True, which is the opposite behavior of a formatting rule created in the user interface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Type As Integer
public: property int Type { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回的常量之一枚举，指定条件格式的类型。

span.span: Returns one of the constants of the enumeration, which specifies the type of conditional format.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 此属性将始终返回值 6，它等效于。
This property will always return a value of 6, which is equivalent to .
